testgroup.title: Immobilizer indicator light ON check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to ON position using ignition key.

testgroup.question: Does immobilizer indicator light come on?

action.ptxt: Go to Immobilizer Indicator Light Does Not Come ON with Ignition Switch ON and Engine at Stop:Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.title: DTC check

test1.ptxt: Check ECM for DTC referring to DTC Check:Petrol Engine Model

testgroup.question: Is DTC P1636 or P1638 detected?

action.ptxt: Go to applicable DTC diag. flow.

testgroup.title: Immobilizer indicator light flash check
testgroup.question: Does immobilizer indicator light flash on and off continuously in Step 1?

action.ptxt: Check what DTC is detected by ECM referring to DTC Check:Petrol Engine Model . Then, perform the troubleshooting referring to the corresponding flowchart in this section.

paragroup.ptxt: Perform engine and emission control system check.
- M16A and J20A models: Refer to

testgroup.title: Immobilizer indicator light remain ON check

test1.ptxt: Check if immobilizer indicator light remains ON after engine start.

testgroup.question: Does immobilizer indicator light remain ON after engine start?

action.ptxt: Go to Immobilizer Indicator Light Remains ON after Engine Start:Petrol Engine Model .
Immobilizer control system is in good condition. Then, go to Keyless Start System Check for the vehicle with keyless start system.
